description.raw:
## Purpose

SubT needs to get bounding box information for the comms model. It only needs bounding box information at the model level. This PR *should* handle both link and model bounding boxes.

What I'm most unhappy about is the calculation of bounding information every iteration. We can live with this for the Acropolis release, but I'm open to other alternatives.

## Required PRs

These required PRs have all been merged.

* ~~#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-physics/pull-requests/68~~
* ~~#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-msgs/pull-requests/91~~

## Testing

1. Run the shapes world: `ign-gazebo-server -r -f shapes.world -v 4`
2. Call the model info service: 

```
ign service -s /world/shapes/model/info --reqtype ignition.msgs.StringMsg --reptype ignition.msgs.Model --timeout 2000 --req 'data: "box"'
```
